participant_1.background:
I'm looking forward to spending time with my son playing some games together.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i love huge paintings.
I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me.
i am saving up to buy a new camera.

participant_2.background:
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
i recently had a private lunch with will ferrell.
I'm not a weather person.
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
I enjoy photographing nature and my pets.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, trying to get some ideas for what to do with my weekend.
Oh, fun! What are you interested in?
I like to do a lot of things, like photography, reading books, and spending time with my dog.
Wow, that's a lot of interests! I'm also a wildlife photographer, and I love to read books too.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to get better at wildlife photography, but I'm not very good at it.
It takes a lot of practice, but it's really fun! I'd be happy to give you some tips if you'd like.
That would be great! Thanks!
No problem! So, what kinds of books do you like to read?
I like a lot of different kinds of books, but I'm especially into historical fiction and mysteries.
Oh, me too! I love historical fiction, especially books about the American Revolution.
That's awesome! I'm reading a book about the American Revolution right now, actually.
Really? What's it called?
It's called "The Patriot."
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out for a hike with my dog, or I might just stay home and read a book.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go out for a hike with my son.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love hiking with my dog.
Yeah, it's a great way to get some exercise and spend time with your loved ones.
Absolutely
